column4: I was trying to make my own mail-notification package by compiling and using checkinstall, and I got this error, how can I fix it?  "dpkg: error processing /home/neil/Desktop/mail-notification-4.0/mail-notification_4.0-1_i386.deb (--install):" "trying to overwrite `/usr/lib/libgconf2-4/2/libgconfbackend-xml.so', which is also in package libgconf2-4"
are you looking for an app to check for new emails periodicaly ?  try gnubiff , multiple accounts
well, I was looking for something to sit in my try and notify me when there's new mail in the account...the actual checking I use Thunderbird for.
it's just a little pannel applet that check if you have new mail, you can then download with your regular client
that works pretty well...but I've been making some of my own other packages, and this isn't the first time I've run into this sort of error...do you know the solution?
sorry, I 've lost track , what error ?
